verses.verse: And <WG1161> as they<WG846> spake<WG2980> unto<WG4314> the<WG3588> people,<WG2992> the<WG3588> priests,<WG2409> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> captain<WG4755> of the<WG3588> temple,<WG2411> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> Sadducees,<WG4523> came upon<WG2186> them,<WG846>

Being grieved<WG1278> that they<WG846> taught<WG1321> the<WG3588> people,<WG2992> and<WG2532> preached<WG2605> through<WG1722> Jesus<WG2424> the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498>

And <WG2532> they laid hands on<WG1911> <WG5495> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> put<WG5087> them in<WG1519> hold<WG5084> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> next day:<WG839> for<WG1063> it was<WG2258> now<WG2235> eventide.<WG2073>

Howbeit <WG1161> many<WG4183> of them which heard<WG191> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> believed;<WG4100> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> number<WG706> of the<WG3588> men<WG435> was<WG1096> about<WG5616> five<WG4002> thousand.<WG5505>
And <WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> morrow,<WG839> that their<WG846> rulers,<WG758> and<WG2532> elders,<WG4245> and<WG2532> scribes,<WG1122>

And <WG2532> Annas<WG452> the<WG3588> high priest,<WG749> and<WG2532> Caiaphas,<WG2533> and<WG2532> John,<WG2491> and<WG2532> Alexander,<WG223> and<WG2532> as many as<WG3745> were<WG2258> of<WG1537> the kindred<WG1085> of the high priest,<WG748> were gathered together<WG4863> at<WG1519> Jerusalem.<WG2419>

And <WG2532> when they had set<WG2476> them<WG846> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> midst,<WG3319> they asked,<WG4441> By<WG1722> what<WG4169> power,<WG1411> or<WG2228> by<WG1722> what<WG4169> name,<WG3686> have ye<WG5210> done<WG4160> this?<WG5124>

Then <WG5119> Peter,<WG4074> filled<WG4130> with the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Ye rulers<WG758> of the<WG3588> people,<WG2992> and<WG2532> elders<WG4245> of Israel,<WG2474>
If <WG1487> we<WG2249> this day<WG4594> be examined<WG350> of<WG1909> the good deed done<WG2108> to the impotent<WG772> man,<WG444> by<WG1722> what means<WG5101> he<WG3778> is made whole;<WG4982>

Be <WG2077> it known<WG1110> unto you<WG5213> all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> to all<WG3956> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> of Israel,<WG2474> that<WG3754> by<WG1722> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> of Nazareth,<WG3480> whom<WG3739> ye<WG5210> crucified,<WG4717> whom<WG3739> God<WG2316> raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> even by<WG1722> him<WG5129> doth this man<WG3778> stand<WG3936> here before<WG1799> you<WG5216> whole.<WG5199>
This <WG3778> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> stone<WG3037> which was set at naught<WG1848> of<WG5259> you<WG5216> builders,<WG3618> which is become<WG1096> the<WG1519> head<WG2776> of the corner.<WG1137>

Neither <WG2532> <WG3756> is<WG2076> there salvation<WG4991> in<WG1722> any<WG3762> other:<WG243> for<WG1063> there is<WG2076> none<WG3777> other<WG2087> name<WG3686> under<WG5259> heaven<WG3772> given<WG1325> among<WG1722> men,<WG444> whereby<WG1722> <WG3739> we<WG2248> must<WG1163> be saved.<WG4982>

Now <WG1161> when they saw<WG2334> the<WG3588> boldness<WG3954> of Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> John,<WG2491> and<WG2532> perceived<WG2638> that<WG3754> they were<WG1526> unlearned<WG62> and<WG2532> ignorant<WG2399> men,<WG444> they marveled;<WG2296> and<WG5037> they took knowledge<WG1921> of them,<WG846> that<WG3754> they had been<WG2258> with<WG4862> Jesus.<WG2424>
And <WG1161> beholding<WG991> the<WG3588> man<WG444> which was healed<WG2323> standing<WG2476> with<WG4862> them,<WG846> they could<WG2192> say nothing against<WG471> <WG3762> it.
But <WG1161> when they had commanded<WG2753> them<WG846> to go aside<WG565> out<WG1854> of the<WG3588> council,<WG4892> they conferred<WG4820> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG240>

saying, <WG3004> What<WG5101> shall we do<WG4160> to these<WG5125> men?<WG444> for<WG1063> that<WG3754> indeed<WG3303> a notable<WG1110> miracle<WG4592> hath been done<WG1096> by<WG1223> them<WG846> is manifest<WG5318> to all<WG3956> them that dwell<WG2730> in Jerusalem;<WG2419> and<WG2532> we cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> deny<WG720> it.

But <WG235> that<WG2443> it spread<WG1268> no<WG3361> further<WG1909> <WG4119> among<WG1519> the<WG3588> people,<WG2992> let us straitly threaten<WG546> <WG547> them,<WG846> that they speak<WG2980> henceforth<WG3371> to no<WG3367> man<WG444> in<WG1909> this<WG5127> name.<WG3686>

And <WG2532> they called<WG2564> them,<WG846> and commanded<WG3853> them<WG846> not<WG3361> to speak<WG5350> at all<WG2527> nor<WG3366> teach<WG1321> in<WG1909> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of Jesus.<WG2424>

But <WG1161> Peter<WG4074> and<WG2532> John<WG2491> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> Whether<WG1487> it be<WG2076> right<WG1342> in the sight<WG1799> of God<WG2316> to hearken<WG191> unto you<WG5216> more<WG3123> than<WG2228> unto God,<WG2316> judge<WG2919> ye.
For <WG1063> we<WG2249> cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> but<WG3361> speak<WG2980> the things which<WG3739> we have seen<WG1492> and<WG2532> heard.<WG191>

So <WG1161> when they<WG3588> had further threatened<WG4324> them, they let them go,<WG630> <WG846> finding<WG2147> nothing<WG3367> how<WG4459> they might punish<WG2849> them,<WG846> because<WG1223> of the<WG3588> people:<WG2992> for<WG3754> all<WG3956> men glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316> for<WG1909> that which was done.<WG1096>
For <WG1063> the<WG3588> man<WG444> was<WG2258> above<WG4119> forty<WG5062> years old,<WG2094> on<WG1909> whom<WG3739> this<WG5124> miracle<WG4592> of healing<WG2392> was showed.<WG1096>

And <WG1161> being let go,<WG630> they went<WG2064> to<WG4314> their own company,<WG2398> and<WG2532> reported<WG518> all that<WG3745> the<WG3588> chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> elders<WG4245> had said<WG2036> unto<WG4314> them.<WG846>

And <WG1161> when they<WG3588> heard<WG191> that, they lifted up<WG142> their voice<WG5456> to<WG4314> God<WG2316> with one accord,<WG3661> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> Lord,<WG1203> thou<WG4771> art God,<WG2316> which hast made<WG4160> heaven,<WG3772> and<WG2532> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> that<WG3588> in<WG1722> them<WG846> is:

Who by<WG1223> the mouth<WG4750> of thy<WG4675> servant<WG3816> David<WG1138> hast said,<WG2036> Why<WG2444> did the heathen<WG1484> rage,<WG5433> and<WG2532> the people<WG2992> imagine<WG3191> vain things?<WG2756>

The <WG3588> kings<WG935> of the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> stood up,<WG3936> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> rulers<WG758> were gathered<WG4863> together<WG1909> <WG846> against<WG2596> the<WG3588> Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> against<WG2596> his<WG846> Christ.<WG5547>

For <WG1063> of<WG1909> a truth<WG225> against<WG1909> thy<WG4675> holy<WG40> child<WG3816> Jesus,<WG2424> whom<WG3739> thou hast anointed,<WG5548> both<WG5037> Herod,<WG2264> and<WG2532> Pontius<WG4194> Pilate,<WG4091> with<WG4862> the Gentiles,<WG1484> and<WG2532> the people<WG2992> of Israel,<WG2474> were gathered together,<WG4863>
For to do<WG4160> whatsoever<WG3745> thy<WG4675> hand<WG5495> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> counsel<WG1012> determined before<WG4309> to be done.<WG1096>

And <WG2532> now,<WG3569> Lord,<WG2962> behold<WG1896> <WG1909> their<WG846> threatenings:<WG547> and<WG2532> grant<WG1325> unto thy<WG4675> servants,<WG1401> that with<WG3326> all<WG3956> boldness<WG3954> they may speak<WG2980> thy<WG4675> word,<WG3056>

By <WG4571> stretching forth<WG1614> thine<WG4675> hand<WG5495> to<WG1519> heal;<WG2392> and<WG2532> that signs<WG4592> and<WG2532> wonders<WG5059> may be done<WG1096> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of thy<WG4675> holy<WG40> child<WG3816> Jesus.<WG2424>

And <WG2532> when they<WG846> had prayed,<WG1189> the<WG3588> place<WG5117> was shaken<WG4531> where<WG1722> <WG3739> they were<WG2258> assembled together;<WG4863> and<WG2532> they were all<WG537> filled<WG4130> with the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> and<WG2532> they spake<WG2980> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> with<WG3326> boldness.<WG3954>

And <WG1161> the<WG3588> multitude<WG4128> of them that believed<WG4100> were<WG2258> of one<WG3391> heart<WG2588> and<WG2532> of one soul:<WG5590> neither<WG2532> <WG3761> said<WG3004> any<WG1520> of them that aught<WG5100> of the things which he possessed<WG5224> <WG846> was<WG1511> his own;<WG2398> but<WG235> they<WG846> had<WG2258> all things<WG537> common.<WG2839>

And <WG2532> with great<WG3173> power<WG1411> gave<WG591> the<WG3588> apostles<WG652> witness<WG3142> of the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> Jesus:<WG2424> and<WG5037> great<WG3173> grace<WG5485> was<WG2258> upon<WG1909> them<WG846> all.<WG3956>

<WG1063> Neither<WG3761> was<WG5225> there any<WG5100> among<WG1722> them<WG846> that lacked:<WG1729> for<WG1063> as many as<WG3745> were<WG5225> possessors<WG2935> of lands<WG5564> or<WG2228> houses<WG3614> sold<WG4453> them, and brought<WG5342> the<WG3588> prices<WG5092> of the things that were sold,<WG4097>

And <WG2532> laid them down<WG5087> at<WG3844> the<WG3588> apostles'<WG652> feet:<WG4228> and<WG1161> distribution was made<WG1239> unto every man<WG1538> according as<WG2530> <WG302> he<WG5100> had<WG2192> need.<WG5532>

And <WG1161> Joses,<WG2500> who<WG3588> by<WG5259> the<WG3588> apostles<WG652> was surnamed<WG1941> Barnabas,<WG921> (which is,<WG3603> being interpreted,<WG3177> The son<WG5207> of consolation,) a<WG3874> Levite,<WG3019> and of the country of Cyprus,<WG1085> <WG2953>
Having <WG5225> land,<WG68> sold<WG4453> it, and brought<WG5342> the<WG3588> money,<WG5536> and<WG2532> laid<WG5087> it at<WG3844> the<WG3588> apostles'<WG652> feet.<WG4228>
